title: Discussion Section Uncut with Kevin Murphy and Casey Mulligan
description: In this episode, Kevin Murphy talks with Casey Mulligan, professor in economics at the University of Chicago. Mulligan examines microeconomic trends, including labor, through a macroeconomic lens, with a particular interest in how policy can inadvertently shape the labor market in unexpected ways.
itunes:author: Becker Friedman Institute at UChicago
